hero.title: Computer Science Student
hero.description: Passionate about technology and building innovative solutions

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Computer Science student at Universitat Pompeu Fabra with a strong passion for programming and problem-solving. I enjoy tackling both academic and personal projects, learning new technologies, and improving my skills to create practical and innovative solutions.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Some of my academic and personal projects showcasing my programming skills and passion. Click to view on GitHub.

passSide.title: Pass Side
passSide.description: Personal project made from scratch, implementing logics and algorithms to create an original board game that combines strategy and fun.

movieMatch.title: MovieMatch
movieMatch.description: Web application built with Streamlit for discovering movies using the TMDB API, featuring search, filtering, and personalized recommendations.

examGrader.title: Exam Grader
examGrader.description: Developed an automated tool in C for grading multiple-choice exams from scanned images as a side project.

vladijoc.title: Study Spark (Hackathon Prototype)
vladijoc.description: Built at Glovo's AI Summit Hackathon: summarizes notes, creates quizzes, and generates explainer videos with AI.

contact.title: Let's connect!
contact.description: Feel free to get in touch to connect, collaborate, or explore new projects.
